scripts.build:css: env APPDIR=$PWD npm explore moj-express-kit -- yarn postcss
scripts.preinstall: if [ -d .git ] && [ -x "$(command -v git)" ]; then npm run githooks; else echo 'git not installed'; fi;
scripts.test:unit: echo no unit tests set up
scripts.test:docker: echo no docker test set up
scripts.test:docker:cleanup: echo no docker test cleanup set up
scripts.watch:css: env APPDIR=$PWD npm explore moj-express-kit -- yarn watchpostcss
